channel.title: The Symphony of Data on Social Informatics
channel.description: Recent content in The Symphony of Data on Social Informatics

item.title: Data description
item.description: Finding data on artists is crucial to answering the research question: “What is the relationship between artist collaboration patterns, popularity, and lyrical expression of genre themes?". Figure 1: Main Data Sources. Data from API’s such as the Spotify API and the Genius Lyrics API alongside addtional data from Kaggle will act as the foundation for the analyses. Collecting all data used for this project bears sign of a “chain-reaction”.

item.title: Network analysis
item.description: Short introduction Repeat short motivation Using Kaggle and Spotify API, incl. link to data-description.md Introduction to networks Generally on social networks Theory from book? Quote from book on networks? Specific on our social network How are node connected (by what)? Have we limited in any way? 1st and 2nd circle, number of features to be considered. Figure 2: Network. Artist network (better name of network) Properties of our network such as avg.
